full_summary:
### Tender Announcement

#### Request for Proposal:

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) invites qualified contractors to submit a proposal for the provision of Tailoring and Clothing Alterations Services.

#### Services:

The successful contractor will be required to provide tailoring and clothing alteration services for both uniformed and civilian personnel of the Department of National Defence. The services will be provided at the Canadian Forces Base Trenton (8 Wing) in Trenton, Ontario.

#### Period of Contract:

The contract period will start from the date of award and will end on 31 March 2025 with two one-year option periods.

#### How to Respond:

* Registration in SAP Ariba is mandatory for each bidder.
* Bidders must complete their Government of Canada profile.
* All amendments will be posted in the Event Messages board in SAP Ariba.
* Bidders must submit their proposal requirements, including a detailed scope of work and supporting documentation, in SAP Ariba.

#### Important Dates:

* Amendment Deadline: 2024-01-18
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-02-28T14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-04-01
* Expected Contract End Date: 2025-03-31

#### Contact Information:

For any inquiries or concerns, please contact:
Ms. Vashti Ramnarine
PSPC/PWGSC  
vashti.ramnarine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca  
Tel: 289-772-7284

#### Request for Proposal (RFP) Documents:

All RFP documents and attachments can be downloaded after logging into your SAP Ariba account.

#### A Side Note

Since the amendment deadline has expired, this tender announcement is open to pre-qualified bidders only. However, all amendments will be posted in the Event Messages board in SAP Ariba for the bidder's awareness.
